snippet: What does your favorite fashion item or accessory say about you?
abstract: What does your favorite fashion item or accessory say about you?
lead_paragraph: While campaigning in Iowa, Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum started making a fashion statement by wearing V-neck sweater vests. Do you have a favorite fashion item or accessory that you wear or carry often? What do you think it says about you?

headline.main: Do You Have a Signature Clothing Item?
